text: And then one night I wasn't able to sleep and I was lying awake thinking about the game And I got this idea for fetch quest with a jumping puzzle where the player would collect three crystals from different locations And it was only a stupidly basic idea like you've probably seen it in a thousand games already, but it would work It would keep the player busy doing something while I kept on talking I think even the fact that it was so basic, so recognizable Was important since it would allow the player to carry out the tasks and still pay attention to what I was saying But then I started thinking about the purpose of these crystals Like why would the player want to collect them in the first place? And I got this other idea that I would play some sort of a machine right in the middle of the level and that this Machine would then have to be powered up by the three crystals Once the player held one of the crystals They would be able to insert it into the power sockets on top of the machine All three crystals would be required for this machine to work

segments.text: And then one night I wasn't able to sleep and I was lying awake thinking about the game
And I got this idea for fetch quest with a jumping puzzle where the player would collect three crystals from different locations
And it was only a stupidly basic idea like you've probably seen it in a thousand games already, but it would work
It would keep the player busy doing something while I kept on talking
I think even the fact that it was so basic, so recognizable
Was important since it would allow the player to carry out the tasks and still pay attention to what I was saying
But then I started thinking about the purpose of these crystals
Like why would the player want to collect them in the first place?
And I got this other idea that I would play some sort of a machine right in the middle of the level and that this
Machine would then have to be powered up by the three crystals
Once the player held one of the crystals
They would be able to insert it into the power sockets on top of the machine
All three crystals would be required for this machine to work
